StateMachine
Interface LWRState

All Known Implementing Classes:
LWRError, LWRGravComp, LWRIdle, LWRMoveToPose, LWRPathImp, LWRVirtualFixtures
interface LWRState

Interface for the LWR States defining the Functions void CalcControlParam(LWRStatemachine lwrStatemachine), void SetACKString(LWRStatemachine lwrStatemachine) and void SetACKString(LWRStatemachine lwrStatemachine).So far realized States are: Idle, GravComp, Registration, SendData, WaitforData, Virtual Fixtures, PathImp, MovetoPose and Error. For Further Information see the Documentation of the particular states. 

 How To add a new State:
        - Add a new State to the LWRStatus enum in the LWRStatemachine class
        - Generate a new class derived from this interface (LWRState) and write the desired functions CalcControlParam(LWRStatemachine lwrStatemachine), SetACKPacket(LWRStatemachine lwrStatemachine) and InterpretCMDPacket(LWRStatemachine lwrStatemachine)
        - Add this State to the if-else block in the LWRStatemachine function CheckTransistionRequest() and define the transition condition
        - Send the Command plus parameters and check if it works

Author:
Sebastian Tauscher
See Also:
LWRIdle, LWRGravComp, LWRVirtualFixtures, LWRPathImp, LWRMovetoPos

static class LWRState.VisualIFDatatype

Method Detail

CalcControlParam

void CalcControlParam(LWRStatemachine lwrStatemachine)

SetACKPacket

void SetACKPacket(LWRStatemachine lwrStatemachine)
In this Function the Acknowledge String which is send to the State Control is defined due the current LWR State. For Further information see the Documentation of the particular State.

Parameters:
lwrStatemachine - The operated state machine
See Also:
LWRIdle, LWRGravComp, LWRRegistration, LWRSendData, LWRWaitforData, LWRVirtualFixtures, LWRPathImp, LWRMovetoPose

InterpretCMDPacket

void InterpretCMDPacket(LWRStatemachine lwrStatemachine)
In this Function the Command String which is received from the State Control is read and interpreted due to the Current State and if requested and allowed the State is Changed. For Further information see the Documentation of the particular State.

Parameters:
lwrStatemachine - - The operated state machine
Throws:
java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
See Also:
LWRIdle, LWRGravComp, LWRRegistration, LWRSendData, LWRWaitforData, LWRVirtualFixtures, LWRPathImp, LWRMovetoPose
